Get In Touch
Beach Park Hotel is located on world-renowned Ocean Drive, just footsteps away from South Beach’s premier night clubs, shopping and restaurants. We are 10 minutes away from attractions like the
Carnival Center for Performing Arts
and the
American Airlines Arena
. Explore the many amazing things to see and do in Miami,  go on an adventure to
Jungle Island
or experience the
Florida Everglades.
Spend the afternoon shopping on
Lincoln Road Mall
and relax with a cocktail and dinner along Ocean Drive or
Espanola Way.
Contact us
600 Ocean Dr, Miami Beach, FL 33139
fdesk@beachparkmiami.com
Call Us: +1 (305) 531 0021

Privacy Overview
This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.

About Beach Park Hotel
Home

About Beach Park Hotel
We are a 54 rooms Boutique Hotel located on world-renowned
Ocean Drive
, on a walking distance from South Beach’s famous night clubs, restaurants and shopping areas. The hotel houses a Mediterranean
seafood restaurant
located at a side, in front of the
Lummus Park.
Our story begins in 1929
1929
Welcome to our Hotel
Beach Park hotel, as originally named, was built in 1929 by famed Mediterranean Style Architect William Brown.
1979
Part of the Art Deco district
Proud winner of the “
Barbara Baer Capitman Award
” for unique Mediterranean Style Architecture.
2001
Historic leader of hospitality.
One of the original Members of the
Miami Beach Architectural Historic District
.
Willian Francis Brown
The architect of Beach Park Hotel
He was the designer of the “million dollar” Miami Beach pier and the Beach dog track. Friends and associates recall that Mr. Brown was an able seaman on saling ships and had sailed around the world before settling here as an architect
Awards Received
Barbara Baer Capitman Award
Beach Park Hotel is a proud winner of the “Barbara Baer Capitman Award” for unique Mediterranean Style Architecture.
